page.title: 15Pit Houses In Edlington.
page.content: These children live in 32 yr old,3- bedroomed pit houses. Lesley lives in Thompson Ave in a brick terraced house,bought from the N.C.B.The family have extended the kitchen,knocked down the outside toilet and built a bathroom downstairs where they also have a living room.The attic is another bedroom. Wayne's family moved in to buy their house in Baines Ave about 4 years ago. One of a 4-house terrace,it has a livingroom downstairs and a new big kitchen,built after the bathroom was moved upstairs.Work on the large garden is Wayne's job. When David's dad started as a face worker the family moved into a semi in Ivanhoe Rd costing Â£8,000 in 1975. Downstairs there is a kitchen,sitting room and bathroom.In the big garden Mr.Cook has built a greenhouse.
